section.heading: Reversion of title upon abandonment of streets.
section.text: Upon the abandonment of any street, avenue, road, or highway, or part thereof, under the provisions of §§ 9-103.01 to 9-103.05, the title to the land contained in such abandoned portion shall revert to the owners of the land abutting thereon.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Street and alley closing and acquisition procedures, see § 9-201.01 et seq.

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
